title: Blood on Lake Michigan
description: The first book in the Shed Skin Trilogy"Loving someone makes us blind to who they are..."Sinead's best friend Kelly understands her like no one else does. She even knows Sinead's supernatural secret.Kelly and Sinead are two kindred souls with what appears to be an unbreakable bond. But when a new boy moves in and Kelly's life with her vampire coven gets turned upside down, everything falls apart for the unlikely friends.As more secrets are revealed, dangerous lines are crossed and the line between love and hate is blurred.
author: Michelle Gartner
